meanings.definition: A continuous sequence or range of things.
meanings.sent1: The continua of colors in the rainbow are beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The continua of numbers on the number line never ends.
meanings.sent3: The continua of flavors in the ice cream shop made it hard to choose.
meanings.sent4: The continua of emotions in her heart flowed like a river.
meanings.sent5: The continua of stars in the night sky sparkled endlessly.

meanings.definition: A continuous series of elements or items.
meanings.sent1: The continua of books on the shelf seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent2: The continua of cars on the highway stretched for miles.
meanings.sent3: The continua of jokes at the party kept everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The continua of waves crashing on the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The continua of footsteps in the hallway echoed in the silence.
